nodes.excerpt: Some rooms are just too big to engage with your Clubhouse audience. AskClubhouse is a free tool that allows your listeners to ask written questions, so you pick them and answer them live on stage.
nodes.title: AskClubhouse - Allow your Clubhouse audience to ask written questions
nodes.author: M. Brook

localize.description: 有些房间实在太大，无法与你的Clubhouse听众互动。AskClubhouse是一个免费的工具，它允许你的听众提出书面问题，所以你选择他们并在舞台上现场回答他们。
localize.tagline: 允许您的会所观众提出书面问题

localize.description: 有些房間實在太大，無法與你的Clubhouse聽衆互動。AskClubhouse是一個免費的工具，它允許你的聽衆提出書面問題，所以你選擇他們並在舞臺上現場回答他們。
localize.tagline: 允許您的會所觀衆提出書面問題

nodes.excerpt: Remote empowers companies of all sizes to employ global teams. We take care of international payroll, benefits, taxes, and compliance, so you can focus on growing your business.
nodes.title: Remote - Remote empowers companies to employ global teams compliantly
nodes.author: Hallie Exall

localize.description: Remote使各种规模的公司都能雇佣全球团队。我们负责处理国际薪资、福利、税收和合规性问题，因此您可以专注于发展您的业务。
localize.tagline: 远程化使企业能够合规地雇佣全球团队。

localize.description: Remote使各種規模的公司都能僱傭全球團隊。我們負責處理國際薪資、福利、稅收和合規性問題，因此您可以專注於發展您的業務。
localize.tagline: 遠程化使企業能夠合規地僱傭全球團隊。

nodes.excerpt: Mirror your iPhone and iPad screen on a web browser with Replica and bring your favorite iOS apps to Mac, Windows or Linux. To celebrate this launch, the screen mirror to a web browser will be free for a limited period of time!
nodes.title: Replica 3.0 - Mirror your iOS screen on a modern web browser
nodes.author: Tiago Martinho

localize.description: 使用 Replica 将您的 iPhone 和 iPad 屏幕镜像到网络浏览器上，并将您最喜爱的 iOS 应用程序带到 Mac、Windows 或 Linux 上。为庆祝此次发布，屏幕镜像到网络浏览器将在有限的时间内免费。
localize.tagline: 在现代网络浏览器上镜像你的iOS屏幕

localize.description: 使用 Replica 將您的 iPhone 和 iPad 屏幕鏡像到網絡瀏覽器上，並將您最喜愛的 iOS 應用程序帶到 Mac、Windows 或 Linux 上。爲慶祝此次發佈，屏幕鏡像到網絡瀏覽器將在有限的時間內免費。
localize.tagline: 在現代網絡瀏覽器上鏡像你的iOS屏幕

nodes.excerpt: Studio photography is no longer out of reach. Our full photo crew carefully hires models, designs scenes, and captures moments to offer you the best studio stock photos possible. With this new platform, you can find exactly what you need –or create it!

nodes.excerpt: LLC. EIN. ITIN. US Address & Bank Account. US Payments. Free Tax Consultation. IRS Tax Filings. Bookkeeping. Website. Phone Number with a Utility Bill. $50,000 in Startup Perks. And More. Launch your LLC from anywhere as a US or Non-US resident in 2 minutes.

localize.description: LLC。EIN. ITIN. 美国地址和银行账户. 美国付款. 免费税务咨询. 国税局报税. 簿记. 网站. 带有公用事业账单的电话号码。50,000美元的创业者福利。以及更多。在2分钟内，以美国或非美国居民的身份从任何地方启动您的有限责任公司。

localize.tagline: 美國和非美國居民成立美國有限責任公司的一站式服務。

nodes.excerpt: Incident Timer is a “days without incident” timer for developers. The beautifully designed dashboard helps you to keep track of major software incidents. It’s free and takes just 2 minutes to set up.

localize.description: Incident Timer是一款专为开发者设计的 "天无事故 "计时器。设计精美的仪表盘可以帮助你跟踪重大软件事件。它是免费的，只需要2分钟就可以设置。
localize.tagline: 开发者的 "无事故天数 "计时器

localize.description: Incident Timer是一款專爲開發者設計的 "天無事故 "計時器。設計精美的儀表盤可以幫助你跟蹤重大軟件事件。它是免費的，只需要2分鐘就可以設置。

nodes.excerpt: Your own version of The Bachelor(ette). Every week, we'll feature bachelor(ette)s you can pitch a date to. We'll live stream some of the finalists. Even if you're not interested in dating one of our bachelor(ette)s, you can matchmake them for prizes.
nodes.title: Pitch a Date - Pitch a date to one of our bachelor(ette)s.
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 你自己版本的单身汉(ette)。每周，我们都会推出你可以投递约会对象的单身汉。我们会直播一些决赛选手。即使你没有兴趣和我们的单身汉约会，你也可以和他们做媒来获得奖品。
localize.tagline: 向我们的单身汉们推荐一个约会。

localize.description: 你自己版本的單身漢(ette)。每週，我們都會推出你可以投遞約會對象的單身漢。我們會直播一些決賽選手。即使你沒有興趣和我們的單身漢約會，你也可以和他們做媒來獲得獎品。
localize.tagline: 向我們的單身漢們推薦一個約會。

nodes.excerpt: Think your company is data driven? Probably. But how do you ensure your data is creating real value for your customers? In this eBook, you’ll learn how use your data to: 👩🏼‍💻 Empower your customers 🏆 Improve your product offering 📈 Drive enduring growth
nodes.title: From Data-Driven to Data Everywhere - How to drive growth with user-facing analytics
nodes.author: Charles Miglietti

localize.description: 认为你的公司是数据驱动的？可能吧。但你如何确保你的数据为客户创造真正的价值？在这本电子书中，您将学习如何使用您的数据。赋予你的客户权力 🏆 改善你的产品供应 📈 推动持久的增长。
localize.tagline: 如何通过面向用户的分析来推动增长？

localize.description: 認爲你的公司是數據驅動的？可能吧。但你如何確保你的數據爲客戶創造真正的價值？在這本電子書中，您將學習如何使用您的數據。賦予你的客戶權力 🏆 改善你的產品供應 📈 推動持久的增長。
localize.tagline: 如何通過面向用戶的分析來推動增長？

nodes.excerpt: Grow your business overnight, every night. Tech startups and newsletter publishers enjoy low-cost growth with our referral program software. - GrowSurf customers see 300-1000% returns and 9-40% monthly growth.
nodes.title: GrowSurf - Build a referral program into your product or newsletter
nodes.author: Kevin Yun

localize.description: 一夜之间，每晚都能增长你的业务。科技创业公司和通讯出版商通过我们的推荐计划软件享受低成本增长。- GrowSurf的客户看到300-1000%的回报和9-40%的月增长。
localize.tagline: 在您的产品或时事通讯中建立一个推荐计划。

localize.description: 一夜之間，每晚都能增長你的業務。科技創業公司和通訊出版商通過我們的推薦計劃軟件享受低成本增長。- GrowSurf的客戶看到300-1000%的回報和9-40%的月增長。
localize.tagline: 在您的產品或時事通訊中建立一個推薦計劃。

nodes.excerpt: Lucky Carrot is an All-in-One Employee Engagement Platform: ⠀ ◾ enables the employees to recognize each other, ◾ brings visibility to employees’ achievements, ◾ makes the employees’ voice heard through surveys, ◾ gives insights to enhance employee engagement.
nodes.title: Lucky Carrot - Make your employees super engaged, recognized, & appreciated
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 幸运萝卜是一个全方位的员工参与平台。⠀◾让员工互相认可，◾为员工的成就带来可见性，◾通过调查让员工的声音被听到，◾提供洞察力，提高员工的参与度。
localize.tagline: 让你的员工超强的参与度、认可度和感激度。

localize.description: 幸運蘿蔔是一個全方位的員工參與平臺。⠀◾讓員工互相認可，◾爲員工的成就帶來可見性，◾通過調查讓員工的聲音被聽到，◾提供洞察力，提高員工的參與度。
localize.tagline: 讓你的員工超強的參與度、認可度和感激度。

nodes.excerpt: Join us for a weekly fireside chat with iconic product leaders: Feb 4: Manik Gupta: former CPO at Uber and product leader at Google Maps Feb 11: Jiaona Zhang, VP of Product at Webflow Feb 18: Sriram Krishnan, Previously at Snap, Twitter, and Facebook
nodes.title: UserLeap: The Biggest Launch - Learn what makes or breaks a successful product launch
nodes.author: Ryan Glasgow

localize.description: 加入我们，每周与标志性的产品领袖进行炉边聊天。2月4日：Manik Gupta，Uber前CPO，谷歌地图产品负责人 2月11日：张佳娜，Webflow产品副总裁 2月18日：Sriram Krishnan，曾就职于Snap、Twitter和Facebook。
localize.tagline: 了解成功的产品发布的成败因素

localize.description: 加入我們，每週與標誌性的產品領袖進行爐邊聊天。2月4日：Manik Gupta，Uber前CPO，谷歌地圖產品負責人 2月11日：張佳娜，Webflow產品副總裁 2月18日：Sriram Krishnan，曾就職於Snap、Twitter和Facebook。
localize.tagline: 瞭解成功的產品發佈的成敗因素

nodes.excerpt: Oneteam can be used by enterprises across all industries and team sizes to ensure efficient team communication. It provides a secure communication interface where companies can ensure that the employees- remote or otherwise can communicate over VoIP
nodes.title: Oneteam - Team collaboration software
nodes.author: Rakesh Sharma

localize.description: Oneteam可以被所有行业和团队规模的企业使用，以确保高效的团队沟通。它提供了一个安全的通信接口，企业可以确保员工--远程或其他方式可以通过VoIP进行通信。
localize.tagline: 团队协作软件

localize.description: Oneteam可以被所有行業和團隊規模的企業使用，以確保高效的團隊溝通。它提供了一個安全的通信接口，企業可以確保員工--遠程或其他方式可以通過VoIP進行通信。
localize.tagline: 團隊協作軟件

nodes.excerpt: Bitwit has the vision of making Bitcoin a commonly accepted currency. We enable Bitcoin holders to see where they can spent their money. Bitwit also helps people understand what their daily purchases cost in Bitcoin using the Bitcoin Daily feature.
nodes.title: Bitwit - Find companies that accept bitcoin as payment
nodes.author: Mehdi

localize.description: Bitwit的愿景是让比特币成为一种普遍接受的货币。我们让比特币的持有者能够看到他们的钱可以花在哪里。Bitwit还通过Bitcoin Daily功能帮助人们了解他们每天购买比特币的成本。
localize.tagline: 寻找接受比特币支付的公司

localize.description: Bitwit的願景是讓比特幣成爲一種普遍接受的貨幣。我們讓比特幣的持有者能夠看到他們的錢可以花在哪裏。Bitwit還通過Bitcoin Daily功能幫助人們瞭解他們每天購買比特幣的成本。
localize.tagline: 尋找接受比特幣支付的公司

nodes.excerpt: With LeafPile you can collect and organize your inspiration, thoughts, images, videos, and links in once place. It is simple, easy to use and best of all free!

nodes.author: Paul Maloney

localize.description: 有了LeafPile，你可以收集和组织你的灵感，思想，图片，视频和链接在一个地方。它简单，易于使用，最重要的是免费。
localize.tagline: 可视化的书签，让你轻松实现。

localize.description: 有了LeafPile，你可以收集和組織你的靈感，思想，圖片，視頻和鏈接在一個地方。它簡單，易於使用，最重要的是免費。
localize.tagline: 可視化的書籤，讓你輕鬆實現。

nodes.excerpt: Alice is an AI camera that works with your smartphone to shoot and share better content in a fraction of the time. Capture crystal clear 4K footage straight out of camera — and share it instantly to your followers.

nodes.excerpt: Quicksize gives you your exact size in the brand and model of your choice based on what you already have in your closet. Coming on Apple and Android soon!
nodes.title: Quicksize - Never order the wrong size again

localize.tagline: 再也不會訂錯尺寸了

nodes.excerpt: A place for your links and notes Keep all of your links and notes in one place, and easily share them with your Clubhouse community. Free your links from limitations of text Save time and effort by shortening links to the right length with one click.

localize.description: 链接和笔记的存放处 将所有的链接和笔记存放在一个地方，并轻松地与你的会所社区分享。让您的链接不受文字限制 一键将链接缩短到合适的长度，节省时间和精力。
localize.tagline: 语音会所的URL缩短器 👋。

nodes.excerpt: Each US state has different schedules and policies for vaccine distribution, so it can be hard to figure out when and where to get vaccinated. We built this simple, free tool so educators can easily monitor their eligibility and subscribe for updates.
nodes.title: COVID-19 Vaccine Tracker for Teachers - A state-by-state educator guide to vaccine eligibility.
nodes.author: Tessa Mu

localize.description: 美国每个州都有不同的疫苗分发时间表和政策，因此很难弄清何时何地接种疫苗。我们建立了这个简单、免费的工具，使教育工作者可以轻松地监测他们的资格和订阅更新。
localize.tagline: 各州教育工作者对疫苗资格的指南。

localize.description: 美國每個州都有不同的疫苗分發時間表和政策，因此很難弄清何時何地接種疫苗。我們建立了這個簡單、免費的工具，使教育工作者可以輕鬆地監測他們的資格和訂閱更新。
localize.tagline: 各州教育工作者對疫苗資格的指南。

nodes.excerpt: Valora is a P2P payment app that allows you to send money like a text message to anyone worldwide. Powered by the Celo blockchain platform, Valora is the only wallet that enables trustless mobile transactions, with an easy-to-use UX, at near-zero fees.
nodes.title: Valora - Send money like a text message to anyone worldwide
nodes.author: Naval Ravikant

localize.description: Valora是一款P2P支付应用，你可以像发短信一样给全球任何人发钱。在Celo区块链平台的支持下，Valora是唯一一个能够实现无信任的移动交易的钱包，具有易于使用的UX，几乎零费用。
localize.tagline: 像短信一样向全球任何人发送资金

localize.description: Valora是一款P2P支付應用，你可以像發短信一樣給全球任何人發錢。在Celo區塊鏈平臺的支持下，Valora是唯一一個能夠實現無信任的移動交易的錢包，具有易於使用的UX，幾乎零費用。
localize.tagline: 像短信一樣向全球任何人發送資金

nodes.excerpt: Browse the best parts of your favorite shows, and enjoy a bite-sized method to discover new ones, via a personalized feed of 60-second highlights generated based on your existing library and interests.
nodes.title: Podz - The best parts of podcasts in a personalized feed
nodes.author: Jackson Deane

localize.description: 浏览您最喜爱的节目中最精彩的部分，并通过根据您现有的资料库和兴趣生成的60秒精彩内容的个性化馈送，享受发现新节目的比特大小方法。
localize.tagline: 个性化喂养中播客的精华部分

localize.description: 瀏覽您最喜愛的節目中最精彩的部分，並通過根據您現有的資料庫和興趣生成的60秒精彩內容的個性化饋送，享受發現新節目的比特大小方法。
localize.tagline: 個性化餵養中播客的精華部分

nodes.excerpt: https://ponicode.com/product-hunt is an essential AI-powered tool to produce professional and clean code ✅ Let the AI take care of unit testing in all your JavasScript or Python functions. Thanks to our little pony 🦄 save time, energy and focus on what truly matters in your code 😎
nodes.title: Ponicode Unit Test - AI-powered unicorn for unit testing
nodes.author: Nicolas Grenié

localize.description: https://ponicode.com/product-hunt 是一个必不可少的人工智能驱动的工具，可以生成专业而干净的代码✅ 让人工智能来负责你所有 JavasScript 或 Python 函数的单元测试。多亏了我们的小马驹🦄，节省了时间和精力，并专注于代码中真正重要的东西😎。
localize.tagline: 用于单元测试的AI动力独角兽。

localize.description: https://ponicode.com/product-hunt 是一個必不可少的人工智能驅動的工具，可以生成專業而乾淨的代碼✅ 讓人工智能來負責你所有 JavasScript 或 Python 函數的單元測試。多虧了我們的小馬駒🦄，節省了時間和精力，並專注於代碼中真正重要的東西😎。
localize.tagline: 用於單元測試的AI動力獨角獸。
